name: Orange-Scented Roasted-Tomato-and-Garlic Dip
recipeIngredient: 15 plum tomatoes, cored and halved lengthwise

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees. Lightly oil a baking sheet and place the tomatoes on it cut side down. Roast until soft and lightly browned, about 20 minutes.

Place the tomatoes in a food processor with the olive oil, orange oil, garlic, lemon juice, cayenne, salt and pepper. Place in a bowl and stir in the parsley. Serve with cut vegetables, bread or crackers.
